Testing vfnmsub213pd (128-bit)
Test 1: -(a*b) - c
a: 1.000000 2.000000 
b: 3.000000 4.000000 
c: 5.000000 6.000000 
result: -8.000000 -14.000000 
result (hex): 0xc020000000000000 0xc02c000000000000 

Test 2: Special values
a: inf nan 
b: 2.000000 3.000000 
c: 1.000000 1.000000 
result: -inf nan 
result (hex): 0xfff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 

Testing vfnmsub213pd (256-bit)
Test 1: -(a*b) - c
a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
b: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
c: 9.000000 10.000000 11.000000 12.000000 
result: -14.000000 -22.000000 -32.000000 -44.000000 
result (hex): 0xc02c000000000000 0xc036000000000000 0xc040000000000000 0xc046000000000000 

Test 2: Memory operand
a: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
b: 0.500000 0.600000 0.700000 0.800000 
c: 0.900000 1.000000 1.100000 1.200000 
result: -0.950000 -1.120000 -1.310000 -1.520000 
result (hex): 0xbfee666666666667 0xbff1eb851eb851ec 0xbff4f5c28f5c28f6 0xbff851eb851eb852
